abilities.description: When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.2f2ba4090b22a122]{Enter the Fray} by rallying your crew to repel boarders or board an enemy ship, you may roll +supply; if you do, take +1 momentum on a hit. On a strong hit with a match, you are poised to overwhelm your foes; take +1 momentum more. In addition, any allies joining the effort may take the outcome and benefits of your move without rolling to @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.2f2ba4090b22a122]{Enter the Fray}.
When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.703964b8d02355b8]{Resupply} by scavenging weapons or ammo from your foes after a fight, add +1.

When you are out of options and set the fuse to self-destruct your command vehicle, activate this ability at no cost. If you do, envision how the sacrifice allows you to escape or overcome your foes amid the chaos. Then, mark 1 box on your quests legacy track and @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.a44ecb0d77487549]{Overcome Destruction}.
